pageContext.description:
New Quay is a sea side town on Cardigan Bay with a harbour and large sandy beaches, it lies on the Ceredigian coastal path. There is a population of bottlenose dolphins that live in Cardigan Bay. There is a strong association with the poet Dylan Thomas and his play Under Milk Wood.

Original watercolour, image size 9.75" x 8.5".

Mounted to fit frame size 20" x 16".

Price £245

A signed, embossed limited edition print is available £40.

image.altText: P824. New Quay Harbour, West Wales.

pageContext.metaDescription: Original watercolour painting of New Quay Harbour, West Wales by Herefodshire artist David J. Fry.
